name: Deltaga.nu
author: Jimmy Dahl

sections.description: This plugin enables you to embed registration forms and startlists for your events on Deltaga.nu into any post or page on your WordPress blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the deltaga folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Log in with your deltaga.nu account
  4. Copy the shortcode for the content you want to embed and paste it on the page/post where you want to embed it
sections.faq:
Do I need to sign up for Deltaga.nu to use this plugin?

Yes, the plugin does only embed content from our stand-alone event registration service

Is this plugin necessary to embed the registration form or a startlist on my homepage/blog?

No, we do provide html code on the Deltaga.nu support pages which you can copy and paste on your blog to embed the information, this plugin just makes it easier to manage.

short_description: This plugin enables you to embed registration forms and startlists for your events on Deltaga.nu into any post or page on your Wordpress blog.
